title: Anyone else having this problem?
body:
Everytime I try to go into the store, I get this message. Anyone else?

https://i.gyazo.com/e2ae1c1c6408b4e79e09e1f5e9edc35f.png

replies.body: Thanks for letting us know! We recently noticed this issue as well, and are working to help get the store back up for everyone. Be sure to check out post [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load) for updates!
I'm having the same problem, it's not resolving itself.
Im having the same problem. How long did it take for it to resolve itself for you guys?
Just had this issue pop up about 5 minutes ago, hasn't resolved itself yet like others have seen
having the same issue except i get a black screen and nothing else
It just fixed itself on its own. weird
Alright an update from me... I have done nothing and it appears it has just randomly fixed itself..... I have no explanation for this.... maybe someone else can shed some light on it?
Yup I just posted it a couple minutes before you did :-)
